resources.string: Arduino is a development platform based on a free hardware electronics board that incorporates a reprogrammable microcontroller and a series of female pins.
Basic components that make up an arduino
This tool is used to decode information for resistors with axial conductors in a color band.

This tool is used to decode information for resistors with axial conductors in a color band. Select the number of bands and then their colors to determine the value and tolerance of the resistors or view all the resistors DigiKey has to offer.

Wide and female cables are essential components in the connection of electronic devices. Wide cables, also known as power cords, provide a robust and secure connection for the transmission of electrical power, while female connectors, with their receptacles designed to accept male connector pins, facilitate the connection and disconnection of devices.
